title: oke rito it time 2 nerf the champ wolfwitch, angry wolf champ
body:
Hi frans , 

U mite rember me , i hatedaddddddy , i make sum gud treads b4 about overpowert champions like mr Yi n zolon time clock guy an even lotion guy w/ ded wifes gun . So i came here bc it time 2 tlk abot anoter overpowert champaign , we all no it wolfwitch [THIS VERY OBVIETS] . 

U c , wolfwitch he overpowert becuz sumhow he wolf can walk on both his 2 feet but he also talk n do wizard dmg , he must be wolf an witch at same tyme . I talk abot his overpowert abilify now cuz he truely op .

So we look at his QQQQ

see dis very op , hungry strike , he somehow scratch u v hard but u c , it do wizard dmg n he steal my health , wtf ? Is health hacking allowed now 4 champaigns ? Mst be a currentlyT champion LOL . N his pacifist , it do same thing 3 , he attck u with his automobile attcks n do wizard dmg w/ ech one an he health hacks me , wtf op .

Now , he have 2 other abilifies they not AS OVERPOWERT but they v strung with his overpowert kite . 1 ability, I tink it his W , he use his witch power to giv him and his frans more attck swings [THEY ATTCK V FAST] , whitch is vary op if u ask me . Then it his other , his E , he can suddently c me no matter how far away I am if i lose sum health , so u give him a wallhack 2 ? Lol wtf cheater fucker noob champaign . But w/e , this still make him very dum .

Now i talk about his ultimant abilify , his r which is very mega OP if u askt me . It called Instant Erect , wolfwitch he get very mad n his body become v hard [CANT ESCAPE] so he stick 2 u no matter what . Then , wut make it very op , he impresses u while he scratches u like crazy n he health hacks u and does wizard damage while u can't move ? Wtf ? Dis is very op n u just let him do this ? CurrentlyT champaigns alwayys very overpowert .

So tank u rito , pls nerf him bc he very op n this silly . I hope u all understant i am tired of this freaklo steeping my League Parts n i go from shiney to brown , wtf .

Buy frans

"Only gaga casts junky" -tupac shakaria

-hatedaddddddy
